author: lgo
msg: Fix error handling in the test suite.
(mhRunServerLoop): Return a generic error code in case of server error.
(run_client_and_mock_servers_loops): If there's an error, break out of the

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue #119: Endless loop with ssl tunnel over proxy with KeepAlive off and
The root cause is that proxy authentication info was stored per connection.
Combined with the proxy killing the connection after a 407 response, serf never
got to initiate the Negotiate handshake.
The solution is to store the Negotiate proxy authentication info per serf
(struct serf_connection_t): Remove proxy_authn_baton because no authn scheme
stores it info per connection anymore. Remove authn_baton and replace it
with a authn_info object for consistency with serf_context_t.
SSPI & GSSAPI secure context object) used for proxy authentication per
serf context instead of per connection.
This enables reuse of this context between multiple connections, and
makes serf send the initial Negotiate headers on the first request on a
serf__validate_response_spnego_auth): Update to new location of gss_info *.

author: lgo
msg: Some refactoring in the test suite, to prepare for proxy tests using the new
(setup): Extract test ctx init code to initTestCtx.
(test_setup, test_teardown): Initialize  and cleanup the test context now
resp. before and after running the test.
setup_test_client_context_with_proxy): When these functions are called, test
context and server setup will already be done, so we can dynamically
fetch proxy and server info from the test context instead of hardcoding
this info. Remove unused argument (init array with fixed capacity).
setup_test_mock_https_server): Store the actual server url.
(test_*): The test_baton * with a pool is now created during test setup.
Setup server and/or proxy first before creating the serf context. This
enables using dynamically assigned port numbers. Drop the
'nr of messages' argument in the function calls to setup the client ctx.
(test_setup_ssltunnel_kerbauthn): Work in progress test, disabled for now.

author: lgo
msg: Migrate the proxy setup test to the new test framework.
setup_test_mock_https_server): Update initialization to follow changes in the
(test_setup_proxy): Migrate to use the mock proxy/server and macro's.
